# Task 03 â€” Accessibility + mobile UX polish

## Summary

Make the icon-only UI accessible and comfortable on mobile.

## Requirements

- Every icon-only control has `aria-label`.
- Touch targets meet minimum size.
- Recorder permissions and errors are explained.
- Dark mode support (optional).

## Acceptance Criteria

- Lighthouse accessibility score improves.
- Controls are usable on mobile.

## How to Test

- Manual: test on iOS Safari/Android Chrome; run Lighthouse.

## Dependencies

- Phase 2/3 UI tasks
